actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of U.S. fuel to train commercial airline and military pilots who are nationals of any foreign country which places an embargo on its shipment of petroleum products to the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of United States petroleum products to train commercial airline and military pilots who are nationals of any foreign country which places an embargo on its shipment of petroleum products to the United States. Imposes a ten-dollar per gallon fine on petroleum products used in violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of U.S. fuel to train commercial airline and military pilots who are nationals of any foreign country which places an embargo on its shipment of petroleum products to the United States.
